description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

When you perform a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{Trick Attack (Ex)} with a one-handed, whip-like melee weapon for your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.bhSrjkuWxz2DQHXC]{debilitating attack}, you can attempt to reposition the target. The target must succeed at a Reflex save or be moved 5 feet to a different location within your weapon’s reach and within 5 feet of its original placement. You can’t move the target past an obstacle. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.5hFENxRv1EN8G8ZX]{Explorer's Lash (Ex)} exploit to learn this exploit.
